operations.body: Implemented reusable multi-board smoke gate: tools/tests/configure_smoke_multi_board.sh and wired CI workflow (.github/workflows/configurator-ci.yml) to run both configure_invalid_board_regression.sh and configure_smoke_multi_board.sh. Verified locally: PASS for 24 boards.
Kickoff: adding deterministic-output checks to confirm repeated configure.py runs produce stable generated artifacts for fixed inputs.
